step1.title: Invite the bot
step1.description: Invite your friends, connect their summoners, and agree on the rules. The bot organizes, you play.

step2.title: Setup your ladder
step2.description: Connect summoners and define rules: SoloQ/DuoQ, points per win/streak, promos and penalties.

step3.title: Let's play
step3.description: The leaderboard updates with your LP and resets weekly. Change rules whenever you want.

items.a: Less than 2 minutes. Just invite the bot and link your Riot Games account.
Yes. The bot synchronizes LP periodically and automatically reflects changes in the leaderboard.
Points are calculated based on the LP you earn from your ranked games.

items.q: What game modes does it support?
items.a: SoloQ and DuoQ. Perfect for individual or duo competition.

items.q: What permissions does the bot request?
items.a: SoloQ and DuoQ. We will soon expand to more.
Of course! It's an open source project, so if you have any questions, we invite you to check out the code on GitHub ;)
